anya-e0803n5:3_0: Vippakiṇṇakathā ettha, evaṁ vutte na hessati;
anya-e0803n5:7_0: Puriso, purisā. Purisaṁ, purise. Purisena, purisehi,
anya-e0803n5:8_0: Ayamāyasmatā mahākaccānena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena katasmā niruttipiṭakato uddharito purisaiccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālānayo.
anya-e0803n5:8_5: Tatra purisoti purisavacane ekavacane paccattavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:9_2: Tatra purisanti purisavacane ekavacane upayogavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:10_3: Tatra purisenāti purisavacane ekavacane karaṇavacanaṁ bhavati, purisehi,
anya-e0803n5:11_2: Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sampadānavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:12_5: Tatra purisāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:12_7: purisamhāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṁ bhavati, purisehi,
anya-e0803n5:13_2: Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sāmivacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:14_4: Tatra puriseti purisavacane ekavacane bhummavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:15_2: Tatra bho purisaiti purisavacane ekavacane ālapanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:15_3: bhavanto purisāiti purisavacane puthuvacane ālapanaṁ bhavatīti iminā nayena sabbattha nayo vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0803n5:16_0: Yamakamahātherena katāya pana cūḷaniruttiyaṁ “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ vatvā “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:16_2: tathāpi bahūnamālapanavisaye “bho yakkhā”itiādīnaṁ ālapanabahuvacanānaṁ jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu dissanato pasatthatarova hoti viññūnaṁ pamāṇañca,
anya-e0803n5:16_3: tasmā iminā yamakamahātheramatenapi “puriso purisā purisa”ntiādīni vatvā āmantane “bho purisa,
anya-e0803n5:19_2: atha kho bahuvacanampi hotīti “bho purisā”iti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito.
anya-e0803n5:19_3: “Bhavanto”tidaṁ pana bahuvacanameva hotīti “purisā”ti puna vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_4: Iti yamakamahātherena “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ vatvā “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_5: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto bhosaddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā bhijjati.
anya-e0803n5:19_7: “api nu kho sapariggahānaṁ tevijjānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ apariggahena brahmunā saddhiṁ saṁsandati sametīti,
anya-e0803n5:19_12: bho pabbajita”iccādipāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa ekavacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:19_14: Yathā mayameva arahāma taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ,
anya-e0803n5:19_15: nāhaṁ bho samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodāmi,
anya-e0803n5:19_17: Bho yakkhā ahaṁ imaṁ tumhākaṁ bhājetvā dadeyyaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_19: bho dhuttā tumhākaṁ kriyā mayhaṁ na ruccati.
anya-e0803n5:19_20: So te purise āha bho tumhe maṁ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā”ti iccādi pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa bahuvacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:20_0: Keci pana adūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchanti,
anya-e0803n5:20_1: dūraṭṭhassālapane pana “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchanti.
anya-e0803n5:20_2: Adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānaṁ itthīnañca ālapane na kiñci vadanti.
anya-e0803n5:20_3: Tathā adūraṭṭhāya dūraṭṭhāya ca itthiyā ālapane te pucchitabbā “adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapane kathaṁ vattabba”nti.
anya-e0803n5:20_4: Addhā te evaṁ puṭṭhā uttari kiñci vattuṁ na sakkhissanti.
anya-e0803n5:20_5: Evampi te ce vadeyyuṁ “bhavanto purisāti imināva adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavatī”ti.
anya-e0803n5:20_6: Tadā te vattabbā “yadi bhavanto purisā”ti iminā advejjhena vacanena adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:20_7: evaṁ sante “bho purisa”iti rassapadenapi dūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṁ vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:20_8: evaṁ avatvā kimatthaṁ adūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisa”iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchatha,
anya-e0803n5:20_9: kimatthañca dūraṭṭhassālapane “bho purisā”iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchatha.
anya-e0803n5:21_1: taggha sugata bojjhaṅgā”tiādīsu ālapanapadabhūtaṁ “bhagavā”iti dīghapadaṁ samīpe ṭhitakālepi dūre ṭhitakālepi buddhassālapanapadaṁ bhavitumarahateva,
anya-e0803n5:21_3: Yasmā panetesu “bhagavā”ti ālapanapadassa na katthacipi rassattaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:21_4: “sugatā”ti ālapanapadassa ca na katthacipi dīghattaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:21_5: tasmā dīgharassamattābhedaṁ acintetvā “purisa”iti rassavasena vuttapadaṁ pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitassa
anya-e0803n5:21_7: āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisassa āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṁ bhavatīti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:21_10: bho dhuttā”tiādīni dīghavasena vuttāni ālapanabahuvacanapadānipi pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitapurisānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:21_12: āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisādīnaṁ āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavantīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n5:21_13: Tathā hi brāhmaṇā katthaci katthaci rassaṭṭhānepi dīghaṭṭhānepi āyatena sarena majjhimāyatena sarena
anya-e0803n5:21_14: accāyatena ca sarena vedaṁ paṭhanti likhitumasakkuṇeyyena gītassarena viya.
anya-e0803n5:21_15: Iti sabbakkharesupi āyatena sarenuccāraṇaṁ labbhateva likhitumasakkuṇeyyaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:21_16: tasmā asampathamanotaritvā “bho purisa”iti vacanena dūraṭṭhassa ca adūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:21_18: bhavanto purisā”ti imehi vacanehipi dūraṭṭhānañca adūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:21_19: Iti dūraṭṭhassa adūraṭṭhānañca āyatena sarena āmantanameva pamāṇaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:21_32: bho cakkhu”iccevamādīhi padehi adūraṭṭhassālapanañca dūraṭṭhassālapanañca bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:21_35: kaññāyo”ti evamādīhipi padehi adūraṭṭhānañcālapanaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:23_0: Tassa taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā, rañño puttaṁ adassayuṁ;
anya-e0803n5:32_0: Na katthacipi dīghattaṁ, iti nīti mayā matā.
anya-e0803n5:33_0: Idampettha vattabbaṁ “kuto nu bho idamāyātaṁ ‘dūraṭṭhassālapanaṁ adūraṭṭhassālapanami’ti”?
anya-e0803n5:34_0: Imasmiṁ pakaraṇe “bahuvacana”nti vā “puthuvacana”nti vā “anekavacana”nti vā atthato ekaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:34_2: tasmā sabbattha “bahuvacana”nti vā “puthuvacana”nti vā “anekavacana”nti vā vohāro kātabbo,
anya-e0803n5:34_3: puthuvacanaṁ anekavacananti ca idaṁ sāsane niruttaññūnaṁ vohāro,
anya-e0803n5:35_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṁ pakaraṇe dvivacanaṁ na vuttanti?
anya-e0803n5:35_10: Teneva hi si yo aṁ yo nā hītiādinā ekavacanabahuvacanāneva dassitānīti.
anya-e0803n5:36_3: mayaṁ aññamaññaṁ pārisuddhiuposathaṁ kareyyāmā”ti pāḷiyaṁ dve sandhāya “āyasmantā”ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_4: “uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā”tiādīsu pana pāḷīsu bahavo sandhāya “āyasmanto”ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_5: na ca sakkā vattuṁ “yathā tathā vutta”nti,
anya-e0803n5:36_18: Na hi akkharasamayakovido jhānalābhīpi dibbacakkhunā vassasatampi vassasahassampi samavekkhanto buddhavacane ekampi kriyāpadaṁ dvivacananti passeyya,
anya-e0803n5:36_19: evaṁ kriyāpadesu dvivacanassābhāvā nāmikapadesu dvivacanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0803n5:37_0: Apica “puthuvacana”nti niruttivohāropi “buddhavacane dvivacanaṁ natthī”ti etamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0803n5:37_1: Tañhi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṁbhūtaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_2: tattha vā vuttehi atthehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacanaṁ “puthuvacana”nti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_3: Kathamidaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṁbhūtaṁ vacananti ce?
anya-e0803n5:37_5: tasmā idaṁ tehi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi dvivacanabahuvacanehi visuṁbhūtaatthassa vacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_6: Kathañca pana sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti ce?
anya-e0803n5:37_7: Yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ dve upādāya dvivacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_12: Māgadhabhāsāyaṁ pana dviticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya puthuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_13: tasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi atthehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_16: puthuno vā atthassa vacanaṁ “puthuvacana”nti attho samadhigantabbo.
anya-e0803n5:38_1: purisa”nti niruttipiṭakato uddharitanayaṁ nissāya pakatirūpabhūtassa bhūtasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n5:39_0: Bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūtaṁ, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūtā, bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūte,
anya-e0803n5:40_1: Yathā panettha bhūtaiccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojitā,
anya-e0803n5:40_2: evaṁ bhāvakādīnañca aññesañca taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:40_3: Etthaññāni taṁsadisāni nāma “buddho”tiādīnaṁ padānaṁ buddhaiccādīni pakatirūpāni.
anya-e0803n5:77_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ “nanu bho ‘orodhā ca kumārā cā’ti pāṭhassa dassanato orodhasaddo itthiliṅgo”ti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:77_6: Nanu ca bho sammohavinodaniyādīsu orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭā,
anya-e0803n5:77_8: “Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva manaṁ palobhetvā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi.
anya-e0803n5:77_9: Thero taṁ kathaṁ sutvā rājorodhānaṁ ācikkhi.
anya-e0803n5:77_11: Ettha hi “rājorodhāna”nti vatvā “tā”ti vuttattāva orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭāti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:77_14: ettha pana orodhasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṁ sandhāya “tā”ti vuttattā “tā itthiyo”ti ayamevattho.
anya-e0803n5:77_15: Tumhe pana amātāpitarasaṁvaddhattā ācariyakule ca anivuṭṭhattā etaṁ sukhumatthamajānantā yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ vadatha.
anya-e0803n5:78_0: Bhuñjanatthaṁ kathanatthaṁ, mukhaṁ hotīti no vade;
anya-e0803n5:79_0: Yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ, vacanaṁ paṇḍito naroti.
anya-e0803n5:80_0: Na mayaṁbho yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ vadāma,
anya-e0803n5:80_5: mā tumhe “aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṁ gahetvā vadāmā”ti aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha.
anya-e0803n5:80_8: na yuttaṁ buddhādīnaṁ garūnamabbhācikkhanaṁ mahato anatthassa lābhāya saṁvattanato.
anya-e0803n5:80_9: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā “attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati,
anya-e0803n5:81_0: Evaṁ abbhācikkhanassa ayuttataṁ sāvajjatañca dassetvā punapi te idaṁ vattabbā –
anya-e0803n5:81_3: Kosiyajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi “satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ mātugāmaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
anya-e0803n5:81_4: Sā kirekassa saddhassa pasannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā”ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n5:81_5: Ettha hi “mātugāmaṁ ārabbha kathesī”ti vatvā “sā”ti vuttattā tumhākaṁ matena mātugāmasaddo itthiliṅgoyeva siyā,
anya-e0803n5:81_9: kiṁ sā eva aṭṭhakathā tumhākaṁ paṭisaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:82_2: Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0803n5:82_3: Etthāpi mātugāmasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṁ sandhāya “sā”ti vuttattā “sā itthī”ti ayamevattho.
anya-e0803n5:82_4: Katthaci hi padhānavācakena pulliṅgena napuṁsakaliṅgena vā samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittāpulliṅgavasena
anya-e0803n5:82_5: vā napuṁsakaliṅgavasena vā niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā itthipadatthamevāpekkhitvā itthiliṅganiddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n5:82_7: “Idha visākhe mātugāmo susaṁvihitakammantā hoti saṅgahitaparijanā bhattumanāpaṁ carati,
anya-e0803n5:82_9: “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0803n5:82_10: yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya,
anya-e0803n5:82_11: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
anya-e0803n5:82_12: Idha mallike ekacco mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā,
anya-e0803n5:82_13: appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthiyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī”ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:82_14: “taṁ kho pana bhikkhave itthiratanaṁ rañño cakkavattissa pubbuṭṭhāyinī pacchānipātinī kiṁkārapaṭissāvinī”ti ca ime payogā.
anya-e0803n5:83_0: Katthaci pana padhānavācakena napuṁsakaliṅgena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittā
anya-e0803n5:83_1: napuṁsakaliṅgavasena niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā purisapadatthamevāpekkhitvā pulliṅganiddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n5:83_3: “Pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0803n5:83_4: Taṁ kho pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṁ ñātānaṁ pavesetā aññātānaṁ nivāretā”ti.
anya-e0803n5:83_5: Katthaci padhānavācakena liṅgattayena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpaṁ niddeso dissati.
anya-e0803n5:83_8: Aṭṭhahi kho nakulamāte dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
anya-e0803n5:84_0: Seyyaiti saddo pana yebhuyyena okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n5:89_0: Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṁ, viññūnaṁ ayaso ca yo;
anya-e0803n5:90_0: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṁ, na yaso appabuddhinaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:91_0: Dummedhehi pasaṁsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e0803n5:94_0: Pavivekaṁ dukkhaṁ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:96_0: Maraṇaṁ dhammikaṁ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammika”nti.
anya-e0803n5:97_0: Evamayaṁ seyya iti saddo okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:97_1: Katthaci pana ākārantabhāve ṭhatvā itthiliṅgānukūlo dissati “itthīpi hi ekacciyā,
anya-e0803n5:97_4: Evaṁpakāre payoge kiṁ tumhe na passathāti.
anya-e0803n5:97_5: Evaṁ vuttā ca te niruttarāva bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:98_0: Sacepi te ettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ “tattha tattha suttappadese aṭṭhakathādīsu ca ‘mātugāmo’ti vā ‘mātugāmenā’ti
anya-e0803n5:98_1: vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena mātugāmasaddassa dassanato pulliṅgabhūtaṁ mātugāmasaddaṁ anapekkhitvā itthipadatthameva
anya-e0803n5:98_2: apekkhitvā “sā itthī”ti itthīsaddena sāsaddassa sambandhaggahaṇaṁ mayaṁ sampaṭicchāma,
anya-e0803n5:98_3: ‘orodho’ti vā ‘orodhenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena ṭhitassa orodhasaddassa adassanato pana tumhehi vuttaṁ purimatthaṁ na sampaṭicchāmā”ti.
anya-e0803n5:98_4: Tadā tesaṁ imāni vinayapāḷiyaṁ āgatapadāni dassetabbāni “tena kho pana samayena rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṁ orodhena,
anya-e0803n5:98_5: atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṁ udenaṁ etadavocā”ti.
anya-e0803n5:98_6: Evaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetvā suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “rāmo nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi
anya-e0803n5:98_7: ca jigucchamāno”ti vacanañca dassetvā “gacchatha tumhe garukulamupagantvā bhagavato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁ
anya-e0803n5:99_1: mātugāmasaddo ca orodhasaddo ca dārasaddo cāti ime itthipadatthavācakāpi samānā ekantena pulliṅgā bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:99_2: Tesu dārasaddassa ekasmiṁ atthe vattamānassāpi bahuvacanakattameva saddasatthavidū icchanti,
anya-e0803n5:99_4: Mayaṁ pana dārasaddassa ekasmiṁ atthe ekavacanakattaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:101_0: Puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe;
anya-e0803n5:103_0: Tasmā hi amhaṁ daharā na miyyare”ti ca,

anya-e0803n5:107_0: Dissati paradāresu, taṁ parābhavato mukha”nti ca,

anya-e0803n5:111_0: Dhammena dāraṁ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī”ti ca,

anya-e0803n5:116_0: Samāhāralakkhaṇavasena panesa dārasaddo napuṁsakaliṅgekavacanopi katthaci bhavati.

anya-e0803n5:116_3: purisasaddanayaṁ nissāya sabbesaṁ “bhūto bhāvako bhavo”tiādīnaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ aññesañcokārantapadānaṁ
anya-e0803n5:117_0: Kiṁ pana sabbāni okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbappakārena ekasadisāneva hutvā paviṭṭhānīti?
anya-e0803n5:117_2: Kānici hi okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n5:117_4: kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti,

anya-e0803n5:123_0: Idāni yathāvuttassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṁ manasaddādīnaṁ nāmikapadamālaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n5:124_0: Mano, manā. Manaṁ, mano, mane. Manasā, manena, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṁ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṁ. Manasi, mane, manasmiṁ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana,
anya-e0803n5:125_1: Evaṁ vaco, vacā. Vacaṁ, vaco, vace.
anya-e0803n5:125_3: Ahasaddassa pana bhummekavacanaṭṭhāne ahasi, ahe, ahasmiṁ, ahamhi, ahu,
anya-e0803n5:126_0: Idāni rūpantaravisesadassanatthaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgassa manasaddassapi nāmikapadamālaṁ vadāma,
anya-e0803n5:127_0: Manaṁ, manāni, manā. Manaṁ, manāni, mane. Manena, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṁ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṁ. Mane, manasmiṁ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana,
anya-e0803n5:128_0: Ettha ca pulliṅgassa manasaddassa paccattakaraṇasampadānasāmibhummavacanāni mano manasā manaso manasīti rūpāni ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni,
anya-e0803n5:128_1: napuṁsakaliṅgassa ca manasaddassa paccattavacanāni “manaṁ manānī”ti rūpāni ca,
anya-e0803n5:128_2: aṭṭhamyopayogavacanānaṁ “manaṁ manānī”ti rūpadvayañca ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni,
anya-e0803n5:129_0: Keci okāranto manoiti saddo napuṁsakaliṅgoti vadanti,
anya-e0803n5:129_8: mano dukkho”ti ca “nicco vā anicco vāti anicco bhante”ti ca evamādayo pulliṅgappayogā bahavo diṭṭhā.
anya-e0803n5:129_11: “anicco dukkho”ti evamādīni taṁsamānādhikaraṇāni anekapadasatānipi napuṁsakaliṅgāneva siyuṁ.
anya-e0803n5:129_18: tathāpi manogaṇe pamukhabhāvena gahitassokārantassa manasaddassa rūpaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0803n5:129_20: Cittasaddena samānaliṅgassa samānasutittepi manogaṇe apariyāpannassa niggahītantasseva manasaddassa rūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:129_21: Manasaddo hi punnapuṁsakavasena dvidhā bhijjati “mano manaṁ”iti yathā “ajjavoajjava”nti.
anya-e0803n5:129_23: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī”ti hi pāḷi.
anya-e0803n5:129_24: Yadi ca so manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo na hoti.
anya-e0803n5:134_0: Ettha manosaddena samānādhikaraṇo “patita”nti saddo napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena kasmā sannihito.
anya-e0803n5:134_2: tasmā saddantarasannidhānavasena manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgoti ñāyatīti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:134_4: Yadi hi samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ sabbattha liṅgavisesaṁ joteyya,
anya-e0803n5:134_5: “cattāro indriyānī”ti etthāpi “cattāro”ti padaṁ indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ kareyya,
anya-e0803n5:134_8: Yadi tumhe “patita”nti samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ nissāya manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattamicchatha,
anya-e0803n5:134_9: “cattāro indriyānī”ti etthapi “cattāro”ti samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ nissāya indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ icchathāti.
anya-e0803n5:134_10: Na mayaṁ bho indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ icchāma,
anya-e0803n5:134_14: Yadi evaṁ “patitaṁ asubhesu munissa mano”ti etthāpi “patita”nti padaṁ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitanti mantvā “patito”ti atthaṁ dhārethāti.
anya-e0803n5:134_25: tasmā na taṁ liṅgavisesajotane ekantato pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:134_32: Yasmā evamādīsupi ṭhānesu liṅgavavatthānaṁ hotiyeva. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n5:134_34: tasmā “patitaṁ asubhesu munissa mano”ti etthāpi “patita”nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ “mano”ti pulliṅganti vavatthānaṁ bhavatīti.
anya-e0803n5:134_37: yasmā manogaṇe pavattānaṁ padānaṁ samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṁsakavasena yojetabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:134_38: tasmā manogaṇe pamukhassa manosaddassapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṁsakavasena yojitāni.
anya-e0803n5:134_43: appakaṁ rāgādi rajo yesaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā”tiādinā saddaracanaṁ kubbiṁsu,
anya-e0803n5:134_44: na pana tehi vaco siro rajosaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ vibhāvetuṁ īdisī saddaracanā katā,
anya-e0803n5:134_45: atha kho siromanosaddānaṁ manogaṇe pavattānaṁ pulliṅgasaddānaṁ katthacipi īdisānipi liṅgavipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n5:134_46: ṭhitāni samānādhikaraṇapadāni hontīti paresaṁ jānāpanādhippāyavatiyā anukampāya viracitā.
anya-e0803n5:134_47: Etthāpi tumhākaṁ matena manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgatte sati vaco siro iccādayopi napuṁsakaliṅgattamāpajjanti
anya-e0803n5:134_50: Addhā te idampi sutvā nibbeṭhetumasakkontā tuṇhī bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:134_51: Kiñcāpi te aññaṁ gahetabbakāraṇaṁ apassantā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ “yadi bho mano saddo napuṁsakaliṅgona hoti,
anya-e0803n5:134_54: yadi tumhe veyyākaraṇamataṁ gahetvā manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ rocetha,
anya-e0803n5:134_55: nanu bhagavāyeva loke asadiso mahāveyyākaraṇo mahāpuriso visārado parappavādamaddano.
anya-e0803n5:134_56: Bhagavantañhi padakā veyyākaraṇā ambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasātisoṇadaṇḍādayo ca brāhmaṇā saccakanigaṇṭhādayo ca paribbājakā vādena na sampāpuṇiṁsu,
anya-e0803n5:134_57: aññadatthu bhagavāyeva mattavāraṇagaṇamajjhe kesarasīho viya asambhīto nesaṁ nesaṁ vādaṁ maddesi,
anya-e0803n5:134_59: evaṁvidhena bhagavatā vohārakusalena yasmā “kāyo anicco”ti ca “kāyo dukkho,
anya-e0803n5:134_61: mano dukkho”ti ca evamādinā vuttā manosaddassa pulliṅgabhāvasūcanikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:134_63: Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyissanti.
anya-e0803n5:136_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṁ, sare. Sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sare, sarasmiṁ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara,
anya-e0803n5:137_0: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:138_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa rahadavācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n5:139_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṁ, saro, sare. Sarasā, sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarasi, sare, sarasmiṁ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara,
anya-e0803n5:140_0: Vayo, vayā. Vayaṁ, vaye. Vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n5:140_2: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa parihānivācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:141_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa āyukoṭṭhāsavācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – vayo, vayā. Vayaṁ, vayo, vaye. Vayasā, vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n5:142_0: Ceto, cetā. Cetaṁ, cete. Cetena, cetehi,
anya-e0803n5:142_2: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa paṇṇattivācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:143_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa cittavācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – ceto, cetā. Cetaṁ, ceto, cete. Cetasā, cetena, cetehi,
anya-e0803n5:143_6: Evaṁ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n5:143_7: ekadesena paviṭṭhāni cāti iminā nayena sabbapadāni paññācakkhunā upaparikkhitvā viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0803n5:143_8: Avisesaññuno hi evamādivibhāgaṁ ajānantā yaṁ vā taṁ vā byañjanaṁ ropentā yathādhippetaṁ atthaṁ virādhenti,
anya-e0803n5:143_9: tasmā yo ettha amhehi pakāsito vibhāgo,
anya-e0803n5:143_11: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca?
anya-e0803n5:143_12: Mano vaco tejosaddādayo ceva ayyasaddo ca,
anya-e0803n5:144_4: bhavanto ayyo”ti dve bahuvacanāni ca vattabbāni.
anya-e0803n5:144_5: Ettha ayyo iti saddo paccattavacanabhāve ekavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:144_7: Tatrime payogā “ayyo kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saṅgāmesi,
anya-e0803n5:144_8: pivatu bhante ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṁ pasanna”nti evamādīni ayyosaddassa paccattekavacanappayogāni,
anya-e0803n5:144_9: “atha kho sā itthī taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca ‘nāyyo so bhikkhu maṁ nippāṭesi,
anya-e0803n5:144_15: Etha mayaṁ ayyo samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajissāmā”ti evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanabahuvacanappayogāni.
anya-e0803n5:145_0: Ayyo iti ayaṁ saddo, paccattekavaco bhave;
anya-e0803n5:147_0: Evaṁ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n5:148_0: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāni?
anya-e0803n5:149_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ, gavaṁ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṁ, gunnaṁ, gonaṁ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṁ, gunnaṁ, gonaṁ. Gāve, gāvasmiṁ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṁ, gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go,
anya-e0803n5:149_2: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhassa gosaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:150_0: Nanu ca bho gosaddo attanā sambhūtagoṇasaddamālāvasena purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho ceva ekadesena na paviṭṭho cāti? Saccaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:150_1: Goṇasaddo gosaddavasena sambhūtopi “vatticchānupubbikā saddapaṭipattī”ti vacanato gosaddato visuṁ amhehi gahetvā purisanaye pakkhitto.
anya-e0803n5:150_2: Tassa hi visuṁ gahaṇe yutti dissati syādīsu ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato,
anya-e0803n5:150_3: tasmā gosaddato sambhūtampi goṇasaddaṁ anapekkhitvā suddhaṁ gosaddameva gahetvā purisanaye sabbathā gosaddassa appaviṭṭhatā vuttā.
anya-e0803n5:151_0: Nanu ca bho paccattavacanabhūto goiti saddo purisoti saddena sadisattā purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhoti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:151_2: na purisasaddādayo viya paṭhamaṁ akārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdhokārantaṭṭho.
anya-e0803n5:151_3: Teneva hi paccattavacanaṭṭhānepi ālapanavacanaṭṭhānepi goicceva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0803n5:151_4: Yadi paccattavacanattaṁ paṭicca gosaddassa purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhatā icchitabbā,
anya-e0803n5:151_5: “kānici okārantapadānī”ti evaṁ vuttā okārantakathā kamatthaṁ dīpeyya,
anya-e0803n5:151_7: tasmā amhehi yathāvutto nayoyeva āyasmantehi manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n5:151_8: Evaṁ gosaddassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n5:152_0: Kecettha evaṁ puccheyyuṁ “gosaddassa tāva ‘go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:152_1: gavaṁ’ iccādinā nayena purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā amhehi ñātā,
anya-e0803n5:152_2: jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā pana kutra naye paviṭṭhā”ti?
anya-e0803n5:152_3: Tesaṁ evaṁ byākātabbaṁ “jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā sabbathāpi purisanaye paviṭṭhā”ti.
anya-e0803n5:152_4: Tathā hi tesaṁ gosaddato ayaṁ viseso,
anya-e0803n5:152_5: jaranto ca so go cāti jaraggavo.
anya-e0803n5:152_6: Ettha nakāralopo takārassa ca gakārattaṁ bhavati samāsapadattā,
anya-e0803n5:152_7: samāse ca simhi pare gosaddassokārassa avādeso labbhati,
anya-e0803n5:152_9: Tathā hi aññattha anupapadattā gavoiti bahuvacanapadaṁyeva dissati.
anya-e0803n5:152_10: Idha pana sopapadattā samāsapadabhāvamāgamma “jaraggavo”ti ekavacanapadaṁyeva dissati.
anya-e0803n5:152_11: Tathā hi jaraggavoti ettha jarantā ca te gavo cāti evaṁ bahuvacanavasena nibbacanīyatā na labbhati lokasaṅketavasena ekasmiṁ atthe nirūḷhattāti.
anya-e0803n5:153_0: Tatra puṅgavoti gunnaṁ yūthapati nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho.
anya-e0803n5:153_2: samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara”nti ca “gavañce taramānānaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:153_4: Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu keci “pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo”ti vacanatthaṁ bhaṇanti.
anya-e0803n5:153_5: Mayaṁ pana padhāne nirūḷho ayaṁ saddoti vacanatthaṁ na bhaṇāma.
anya-e0803n5:153_6: Na hi puṅkokilotiādisaddānaṁ kokilādīnaṁ pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā viya imassa pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā sambhavati,
anya-e0803n5:153_7: atha kho padhānabhāvappakāsane ca samatthatā sambhavati.
anya-e0803n5:153_8: Tena “sakyapuṅgavo”tiādīsu nisabhasaṅkhāto puṅgavo viyāti puṅgavo, sakyānaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:153_9: sakyesu vā puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavotiādinā samāsapadattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n5:153_10: Atha vā uttarapadatte ṭhitānaṁ sīhabyagghanāgādisaddānaṁ seṭṭhavācakattā “sakyapuṅgavo”tiādīnaṁ “sakyaseṭṭho”tiādinā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n5:153_11: Iti sabbathāpi purisanaye pavattanato jaraggava puṅgavādisaddānaṁ gosaddassa padamālato visadisapadamālatā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:153_12: Gosaddassa pana purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā ca vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:154_1: tasmā taṁmatena tassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:154_2: “Aṅguttarāpesū”ti pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena āpo”ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:154_3: ṭīkāyaṁ pana taṁ ulliṅgitvā “mahiyā nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti,
anya-e0803n5:154_4: tāsaṁ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpo”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:154_5: Evaṁ āpasaddassa ekantena itthiliṅgatā bahuvacanatā ca ācariyehi icchitā,
anya-e0803n5:154_6: tesaṁ mate āpoiti itthiliṅge paṭhamābahuvacanarūpe honte dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpāni kīdisāni siyuṁ.
anya-e0803n5:154_8: purisehi purisebhi purisesū”ti rūpavato pulliṅgassa viya okārantitthiliṅgassa ekāraehi kārādiyuttāni rūpāni katthacipi na dissanti.
anya-e0803n5:154_9: Ato tesaṁ mate padamālānayo atīva dukkaro.
anya-e0803n5:157_0: Iccāpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanantatā veyyākaraṇānaṁ mataṁ nissāya anumatāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n5:157_1: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pana āpo iti saddassa napuṁsakaliṅgekavacanavasena vutto payogo diṭṭho “omattaṁ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta”nti.
anya-e0803n5:157_5: Imasmiṁ padese āpo iti saddo ekavacanaṭṭhāne ṭhito diṭṭho.
anya-e0803n5:157_6: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ “āpoti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ salilaṁ suci sugandhaṁ hutvā tattha abhisandatīti salilaṁsaddavasena ekavacanappayogo kato,
anya-e0803n5:157_8: Āpasaddo hi ekantenitthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacananto ca.
anya-e0803n5:157_9: Tathā hi ‘āpo tatthābhisandantī’ti bahuvacanavasena tappayogo vattabbopi chandānurakkhaṇatthaṁ vacanavipallāsavasena niddiṭṭho”ti. Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:157_10: “āpo tatthābhisandare”ti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyattā “tāni ajja padissare”ti bahuvacanappayogā viya.
anya-e0803n5:158_1: nanu pāḷiyaṁyeva tassa bahuvacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhā “āpo ca devā pathavī ca,
anya-e0803n5:158_3: Ettha hi “devā”ti saddaṁ apekkhitvā “āgamu”nti bahuvacanappayogo kato,
anya-e0803n5:158_5: Yadi “āpo”ti saddaṁ sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā,
anya-e0803n5:158_6: “pathavī”ti “tejo”ti “vāyo”ti ca saddampi sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā.
anya-e0803n5:158_7: Evaṁ sante pathavī tejo vāyosaddāpi bahuvacanakabhāvamāpajjeyyuṁ,

anya-e0803n5:158_28: Evaṁ ekasmiṁ janapadeyeva bahuvacanaṁ na āpasaṅkhāte atthe,
anya-e0803n5:159_0: Tathāpi ye evaṁ vadanti “āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanakocā”ti.

anya-e0803n5:160_2: Āpasaddato paṭhamāyovacanaṁ katvā tassokārādesañca katvā āpoti padaṁ sijjhati “gāvo”ti padamivāti.
anya-e0803n5:160_5: Tathā hi yomhi pare gosaddantassāvādesaṁ katvā tato yonamokārādesaṁ katvā “gāvo”ti nipphajjati,
anya-e0803n5:160_6: āpasadde pana dve ādesā na santi.

anya-e0803n5:161_3: tatheva āposaddo kiṁ itthiliṅgo na bhavissati bahuvacanako cā”ti?

anya-e0803n5:162_6: Tathā yesaṁ evaṁ hoti “āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā”ti,

anya-e0803n5:166_5: tathā “dukkhaṁ vaco etasmiṁ vipaccanīkasāte puggaleti dubbaco”ti ettha “vaco”ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṁ “dukkha”nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:166_6: “avanataṁ siro yassa so avanatasiro”ti ettha “siro”ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṁ “avanata”nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ,

anya-e0803n5:166_8: Na te ācariyā tehi samānādhikaraṇapadehi tamavacasirasaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ tathāvidhaṁ saddaracanaṁ kubbiṁsu,

anya-e0803n5:335_4: kevalaṁ pana mukhasaddayogato bahuvacanabhāvato vikappanato ca “purisāyā”tiādīni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n5:335_7: “catutthīti kimatthaṁ purisassa mukha”nti vadanto “sace āyādeso bhaveyya,
anya-e0803n5:335_10: na ca tena “mukhasaddaṭṭhāne detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade ṭhite āyādeso hotī”ti dasseti.
anya-e0803n5:335_11: “Ekavacanassāti kimatthaṁ purisānaṁ dadātī”ti vadantopi “ekavacanasseva āyādeso hoti,
anya-e0803n5:335_13: “Dadātī”ti idaṁ padaṁ “purisāna”nti padassa sampadānavacanattaṁ ñāpetuṁ avoca,
anya-e0803n5:335_14: na ca “detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade sati catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hotī”ti imamatthaṁ viññāpeti.
anya-e0803n5:335_15: “Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā”ti ca vadantopi “sampadāneyeva vikappena āyādeso hotī”ti viññāpeti,
anya-e0803n5:336_0: Yadi pana dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ siyā,
anya-e0803n5:336_1: vuttikārakena lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṁ mūlodāharaṇeyeva “atthāya hitāyā”ti tadatthapayogāni viya “purisāya dīyate”tiādi vattabbaṁ siyā,
anya-e0803n5:336_4: Buddhavacane porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca tādisassa payogassa abhāvā.
anya-e0803n5:336_5: Niruttipiṭake hi pabhinnapaṭisambhido so āyasmā mahākaccāno “purisassa dīyate”ti āyādesarahitāniyeva rūpāni dasseti,
anya-e0803n5:336_6: “atthāyāti sampadānavacana”nti bhaṇantopi ca thero dānādikriyāpekkhaṁ akatvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṁ rūpameva niddisi.
anya-e0803n5:336_8: Iti imehi kāraṇehi jānitabbaṁ “dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ na kata”nti.
anya-e0803n5:336_9: Yajjevaṁ “atthāya hitāyā”tiādīniyeva tadatthappayogāni “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti lakkhaṇassa visayā bhaveyyuṁ,
anya-e0803n5:337_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante vuttikārakena mūlodāharaṇesu “atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna”nti vatvā “mūlāya paṭikasseyyā”tiādīnipi vattabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:337_1: kimudāharaṇe pana “vāti kimatthaṁ saggassa gamanena vā”ti vattabbanti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:337_6: saggāyā”ti padāni suddhasampadānavacanāni na honti gatyatthakammani vattanato,
anya-e0803n5:337_8: Tathā “dakāya netī”ti ettha “dakāyā”ti padaṁ nayanatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_9: “Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā”ti ettha pana “vacanāyā”ti padaṁ nissakkavacanatthe vattanato,
anya-e0803n5:337_11: “asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā”ti ettha “dhanañcayāyā”ti padaṁ kattuvasena sāmiatthe vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_12: Kimudāharaṇepi “saggassā”ti padaṁ gamanasaddasannidhānato gatyatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n5:337_13: na hotīti “vāti kimatthaṁ saggassa gamanena vā”ti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_14: Evañhettha vuttanayena buddhavacanaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni
anya-e0803n5:337_16: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisayeti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:338_0: Nanu ca bho “candanasāraṁ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi suvaṇṇamālaṁ kaniṭṭhāyā”ti dānappayoge catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitarūpadassanato “rājakaññāya dīyate,
anya-e0803n5:338_6: atha kasmā “buddhavacanaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:338_7: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye”ti vadathāti?
anya-e0803n5:338_9: na hi bhavaṁ amhākaṁ vacanatthaṁ jānāti.

anya-e0803n5:338_14: āyādesasahitāni rūpāni buddhavacanādīsu dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti.
